items.typeLine: Surgeon's Quartz Flask of the Owl
explicitMods: 35% chance to gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike
61% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Nebulis
explicitMods: 20% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%
20% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%
flavourText: The vastness of the cosmos holds energies beyond comprehension,
should one have the fortitude to grasp them.

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius
Consecrated Ground created during Effect applies 7% increased Damage taken to Enemies
102% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: The Overflowing Chalice
explicitMods: 100% increased Charges gained by Other Flasks during Effect
Gains no Charges during Effect of any Overflowing Chalice Flask

items.name: Incandescent Heart
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Projectile Gems
explicitMods: 0.86% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Gain 20% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
25% of Elemental Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
Light Radius is based on Energy Shield instead of Life
flavourText: Only light may banish the shadows from this land
And the black lies wrapped around your heart

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 71% increased Projectile Speed
Supported Skills deal 29% increased Projectile Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spell skills, making them repeat when cast. Cannot support Vaal skills, totem skills, channelling skills, triggered skills, instant skills, blink skills, or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods: Supported Skills Repeat an additional time
Supported Skills have 59% more Cast Speed
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Spell Damage

items.name: Marylene's Fallacy
flavourText: "Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast
before every duel and every cast of the die."
- Victario, the People's Poet

items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: 50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified items. Cannot be used by Traps or Mines.
explicitMods: Can use Items requiring up to Level 100
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

and experience true freedom.
